translations: （使）结束，（使）终止；到达终点站；终止妊娠，人工流产；<美>解雇；<美>谋杀（某人）；在……结尾，以……收尾

sentences.sentence: After a lot of agonizing she decided to terminate the pregnancy.
sentences.translation: 在多次痛苦的考虑后，她决定终止妊娠。

sentences.sentence: In American law, you cannot terminate an employee, for the sole purpose of age.
sentences.translation: 在美国法律中，你不能仅仅因为年龄而解雇员工。

sentences.sentence: People are often hesitant to terminate a project when they've already invested time or resources into it, even if it might make logical sense to do so.
sentences.translation: 当人们已经在项目上投入了时间或资源时，他们常常会犹豫是否要终止项目，即使这样做是合乎逻辑的。
